title: Family package in Port Stephens from $195 Ramada Port StephensTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Family package in Port Stephens from $195 Ramada Port Stephens
The Port Stephens beachside property of Ramada Resort Shoal Bay is offering family stay packages this spring from just $195 a night if you book before October 31, 2015, for stays until November 15, 2015.
The deal includes free bike hire per child, free DVD hire, free poolside wi-fi, a family-friendly check-out of 11am, a bottle of wine for the parents and accommodation for a family of four in a one-bedroom apartment, with two children under 12 able to share a sofa bed. The deal is available through the September-October school holidays and on weekends, subject to availability, and conditions apply, including a minimum two-night stay.
Overlooking the white beaches and blue, dolphin-filled waters of Port Stephens, Ramada Resort Shoal Bay boasts four restaurants and cafes, five bars, a lagoon-style swimming pool and bike hire. The resort lies in the heart of Port Stephens and is 2Â½ hours north of Sydney and 30 minutes from Newcastle Airport where direct flights link the region with Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane and the Gold Coast.
Port Stephens offers pristine bay and ocean beaches, stunning national park scenery, dolphin and whale cruises, dolphin swim experiences, koalas, sandboarding down the biggest sand dunes in Australia, horseriding, quadbiking on the dunes, parasailing, kayaking and surfing as well as an abundance of fresh local seafood and produce.
